title: General Settings

branding.title: Branding & Style Settings
branding.description: Customize logo, name, colors and other brand elements & UI style.

appName.label: Application Name
appName.description: Name displayed in browser tab and UI.

favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.description: Icon displayed in browser tab. (PNG, ICO files recommended)

logo.label: Logo Image
logo.description: Logo displayed in sidebar. (PNG, SVG files recommended)

sidebarTextColor.label: Sidebar Text Color
sidebarTextColor.description: Set the text color of the sidebar. Choose a color with good contrast against the background for readability.

sidebarBackgroundColor.label: Sidebar Background Color
sidebarBackgroundColor.description: Set the background color of the sidebar. Enter a HEX color code or use the color picker.

timezone.label: Standard Time (GMT)
timezone.description: Select one of the global GMT offsets. If not set, the browser's GMT is applied automatically.

limitApiKeyEndpoint.label: Limit API Key Endpoints
limitApiKeyEndpoint.description: Restrict API key usage to specific endpoints.

basic.title: Basic Authentication Settings
basic.description: Manage basic settings for user registration and JWT tokens.

emailVerification.label: Require Email Verification
emailVerification.description: Require email verification for new user registrations.

expiry.label: JWT Token Expiry Time
expiry.description: Set the validity period for user login tokens. Use shorter durations for security-critical environments and longer durations for convenience-focused environments.

ldap.title: LDAP Authentication
ldap.description: Configure user authentication through LDAP server.
ldap.label: LDAP

oauth.title: OAuth Authentication
oauth.description: Configure social login through external services.

saveSuccessMessage: System settings have been successfully saved.
saveFailureMessage: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
savePartialFailureMessage: Some settings were not saved. Check the console for details.
